thread.title: Google celebrates evidence of water on Mars with its doodle | Deccan Chronicle
thread.title_full: Google celebrates evidence of water on Mars with its doodle | Deccan Chronicle

author: ANI
title: Google celebrates evidence of water on Mars with its doodle | Deccan Chronicle
text:
ANI | September 29, 2015, 10.52 am IST Share Tweet Printer-friendly version Send by email The animated doodle shows round red 'happy' Mars sipping a glass of water Google is celebrating the evidence of water found by NASA on Mars by dedicating it to today's creative doodle.
The animated doodle shows round red 'happy' Mars revolving around its axis and sipping a glass of water. After multiple experiments and tests NASA announced that liquid water has been found on Mars that may harbor hopes of some life forms on the planet.
